div.pre: 1091 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1910 Burial: c. 275-225 B.C. Contents: 15 AE. In burial Panticapaeum: AE (as BMC 28-29, 10 struck over BMC 23) Disposition: museum material lost during war â€ Shkorpil, IAK 47 (1913), pp. 49-50, no. 23 Shelov, MIA 33 (1954), p. 59
